item.title: Apple Bread For 200 Recipe
item.description: Our apple bread recipe is easy to make about a 15 minute prep time. This recipe from scratch will keep your clients happy. Apple quick bread for 200 will enhance any breakfast and makes great muffins too. Apple Bread Or Muffins For 200 Prep time: 15-20 minutes Bake time: 40 minutes Yield: 280 pieces Apple Bread Ingredients 2 #10 cans sliced apples (chop up to marble size pieces) 20 c sugar 10 c vegetable oil 40 eggs 2 tbsp vanilla 1 tbsp salt 2 tbsp cinnamon 1 c milk 40 c flour 3 tbsp baking powder 3 tbsp baking soda Apple Bread Directions In large 60 qt.
